articles.description: John Davis scored 13 points, Daniel Fowler had 12 and Furman defeated Wofford 76-52 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Furman has big runs to dump Wofford 76-52

articles.description: Brandon Carroll scored 23 points and Bryant, which nearly blew an 18-point second-half lead, upset Mount St. Mary's 79-77 on Saturday, snapping a nine-game losing streak.
articles.headline: Bryant beats Mt St Mary's 79-77, snaps 9-game losing streak

articles.description: No. 4 Michigan State overcomes a double-digit deficit in the first half and gets a go-ahead 3-pointer from Miles Bridges in the final seconds to beat No. 3 Purdue 68-65.
articles.headline: Michigan State tops Purdue late

images.caption: No. 4 Michigan State overcomes a double-digit deficit in the first half and gets a go-ahead 3-pointer from Miles Bridges in the final seconds to beat No. 3 Purdue 68-65.
images.name: Michigan State tops Purdue late

articles.description: Demajeo Wiggins had 17 points and 15 rebounds -- his 10th double-double of the season -- and Matt Fox scored 12 points, including a critical 3-pointer, and Bowling Green beat Eastern Michigan 70-63 in overtime on Saturday.
articles.headline: Wiggins, Fox help Bowling Green beat E. Michigan in OT

articles.description: Nick McGlynn scored 17 points and Drake led virtually the entire way in taking a 71-64 victory over Northern Iowa on Saturday.
articles.headline: McGlynn scores 17, Drake beats Northern Iowa 71-64

articles.description: Otis Livingston II scored 14 points, Jaire Grayer added 12 points and 12 rebounds and George Mason held off George Washington for a 72-65 victory on Saturday.
articles.headline: George Mason holds off George Washington, wins 72-65
